title: Did the same sex kiss in Cadbury Ed Spark make the angry plea?
subtitle: On the Internet, two men claimed to share chocolate in the Cadbury Declaration was "Selling Sex to Children."
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A petition for circulation in mid-February 2021 requested the withdrawal of the so-called "shit and non-produced" Cadbury eggs, which include a couple of same-sex couples.
